Text:
uhm... not to bug around or sumthing but it would be nice to provide a bit more info...
Like bitrate, file format (FLAC, MP3, AAC, Ogg Vorbis), perhaps even year of release ;)

I especially miss the first one, as you can check the file format by clicking the ammount of files, but still ;)

Sorry, its a new band to me too.

lol

its just plain and simple for the people who dont care that much bout that stuff. but, Thanx :)

some people wont trust a torrent that doesn't have details in plain sight, to us pirates that looks like your hiding something... i am not saying you are, but we have to assume the worst in this business =P too many bad torrents out there.

Also some people (like me) are Audiophiles, and want to know which torrent has the highest bit rate or even if it is uncompressed.
Good torrent, no virus or trojans detected.  Sounds good.
